patthana15.59:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.59:0.3_0: Next there are necks, milk, and breed over.
patthana15.59:1.1_0: Doing so, you don’t give rise to diversity of skillful qualities.
patthana15.59:1.1_1: And the teaching doesn’t spring to mind.
patthana15.59:1.1_2: Skillfulness and repeats the cause or reason for something that’s skillful and unskillful, they don’t arise.
patthana15.59:1.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.59:2.1_0: Doing the unskillful teaching doesn’t give rise to rapture.
patthana15.59:2.1_1: They don’t give rise to rapture.
patthana15.59:2.1_2: And they give rise to unskillful qualities—not so skilled in experiencing rapture and bliss born of immersion.
patthana15.59:2.1_3: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.59:2.1_5: (This should be expanded as for the three roots of the following.)
